modName: Be a Manikin plus an Invisible race Ver 2
summary:
This is my first ever mod ever!
SHADING ERRORS FIX, AND NEW PICTURES!
descriptionHtml:
This mod features two new fully playable races: a Manikin and an invisible man.
If your really bored and want something different I recommend you download this mod.
------------------------------------------INSTALLATION------------------------------------------
MANUAL-Just drag the contents of the folder into the data folder of your skyrim directory

NMM- I don\'t use NMM so I couldn\'t tell you how to do it
-----------------------------------------NOTES----------------------------------------------------
-To make the manikin look like a manikin instead of a nord, hover over switch his sex to female and back to male again

-DO NOT CHANGE ANYTHING WHILE IN THE RACE MENUS FOR EITHER RACE OR YOUR GAME WILL CRASH! (excluding the previous note)

-If you are playing as the invisible man race, don\'t use the \"showracemenu\" console command or your game will crash.

-I\'m still testing the mod for any bugs so if you find any please tell me.
------------------------------------THINGS I MIGHT ADD IN THE FUTURE-----------------------------------
-A house mod for both the races
-MAYBE custom weapons and armor sets
-I\'ll likely add a follower (when I learn how to do that :p)
------------------------------------PROJECTS I\'M CURRENTLY WORKING ON_-------------------------------
-A more race mod featuring
-10 new types of khajits,and Argonians 
-5 new types of orcs and MAYBE nords and elves
-I\'m still thinking about doing custom textures for the races
-custom eye textures
-New followers
-MAYBE a custom quest line
-A custom home
-Custom weapons and armors
(this wont come out for approximately 4-8 months depending on how fast i can learn how to do the majority of all this) 
ALSO an over powered race and a smurf race........yea I typed it XD
IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS SKYPE ME @ fried_watermelon or post it in the comments section.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Any ways if you like the mod please feel free to endorse and I\'ll see ya around the nexus!
author: fried_watermelon
